mapper.select: select c.create_time as createTime2,a.title,a.id,ui.nickname as username,ui.avatar as userAvatar from b_collect c left join b_article a on c.article_id = a.id left join b_user u on a.user_id = u.id left join b_user_info ui on ui.id = u.user_info_id where c.user_id = #{userId} order by c.create_time desc
